metadata.description:
Mad Max meets Akira!

In a future where history was reshaped by godlike psychics, Kasa Fain is the only girl in the world without a power of her own. When her brother is kidnapped, she's going to need to use every thing she does have to get him back. 

Part of the comiXology Originals line of exclusive digital content only available on comiXology and Kindle. These titles will be available as part of comiXology Unlimited, Kindle Unlimited and Prime Reading at release.
metadata.name: Breaklands (comiXology Originals)
